questions_and_answers.subject: comfyui-Image-reward
questions_and_answers.question: What does the comfyui-Image-reward integration collaborate with to convert the workflow into an app?
questions_and_answers.answer: The comfyui-Image-reward integration collaborates with [mixlab-nodes](https://github.com/shadowcz007/comfyui-mixlab-nodes) to convert the workflow into an app.

questions_and_answers.subject: comfyui-Image-reward
questions_and_answers.question: What is the task of the ImageReward model?
questions_and_answers.answer: The ImageReward model is for human preference learning in text-to-image generation.

questions_and_answers.subject: comfyui-Image-reward
questions_and_answers.question: Which professional large-scale dataset is the ImageReward model trained with?
questions_and_answers.answer: The ImageReward model is trained with the ImageRewardDB dataset.

questions_and_answers.subject: comfyui-Image-reward
questions_and_answers.question: How many comparison pairs are there in the ImageRewardDB dataset?
questions_and_answers.answer: There are approximately 137,000 comparison pairs in the ImageRewardDB dataset.

questions_and_answers.subject: comfyui-Image-reward
questions_and_answers.question: What is the name of the paper related to the ImageReward model?
questions_and_answers.answer: The paper related to the ImageReward model is for NeurIPS 2023.

questions_and_answers.subject: comfyui-Image-reward
questions_and_answers.question: Where should the ImageReward and bert-base-uncased models be placed in ComfyUI?
questions_and_answers.answer: The ImageReward.pt and med_config.json files should be placed in ComfyUI/models/image_reward/ and the bert-base-uncased model should be placed in ComfyUI/models/image_reward/bert-base-uncased/.

questions_and_answers.subject: comfyui-Image-reward
questions_and_answers.question: Does the comfyui-Image-reward integration provide a workflow example?
questions_and_answers.answer: Yes, the comfyui-Image-reward integration provides a workflow example in ./example/image-reward-workflow.json.
